fields.summary: trying to build an project but throwing error:"ERROR  | spawn wmic ENOENT"

comments.body:
Hello, 

There are some useful link you can follow that might help you resolve the issue. 

1. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/30030637/meteor-1-1-error-spawn-enoent-on-windows-8-1
2. http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27688804/how-do-i-debug-error-spawn-enoent-on-node-js
3. https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=1&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0ahUKEwj_rcrks4zMAhUF1xQKHQf1CaEQFggdMAA&url=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fsindresorhus%2Fkill-tabs%2Fissues%2F3&usg=AFQjCNGDaw6RleLFQjqSKJMa4X44n2mXsg&sig2=uMiZy64En1vLrr0ChB8fOA

I would suggest you upadte your node too.

Regards,
Sharif.
